name.japanese: ゴーイング・メリー号

keyEvents.title: Rice Rice Rescued
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew rescues Rice Rice from the water and brings him aboard the Going Merry.

keyEvents.title: Product Demonstrations on Deck
keyEvents.description: Rice Rice demonstrates various products from his catalog on the deck of the Going Merry to the interested crew members.

keyEvents.title: Nami's Mapmaking Workspace
keyEvents.description: Nami settles down on the Going Merry to work on creating detailed maps of Little Garden, Drum Island, and Arabasta using her new Millennium Paper.

keyEvents.title: Navigating Through Tornado
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry encounters and navigates through a deadly tornado at sea, with Nami providing crucial guidance.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' ship serves as the primary setting for this episode, where Nami works on her cartography and the crew interacts with Rice Rice.
significance: The Going Merry is the home and workspace for the Straw Hats, providing both the freedom to pursue their dreams and the chaos of communal living.

keyEvents.title: Nami's Childhood Dream Flashback
keyEvents.description: In a flashback, young Nami stands on a cliff in Cocoyasi Village with Bell-mère and Nojiko, expressing her curiosity about what lies beyond the sea and her dream to explore the world.

keyEvents.title: Bell-mère's Encouragement
keyEvents.description: Bell-mère praises young Nami's first map drawing in Cocoyasi Village, encouraging her dream to map the entire world.

description: Nami's hometown appears in flashbacks, showing the origins of her cartography dream and Bell-mère's encouragement.
significance: Cocoyasi Village represents Nami's roots and the place where her dreams were first nurtured by Bell-mère. The flashbacks contrast her past constraints with her current freedom.
